note.p: Surgeon. MD, St Andrews, 1862. Assistant house surgeon, Great Northern Hospital, London; assistant medical officer, County Lunatic Asylum, Nottingham; colonial surgeon, Falkland Islands (Port Stanley), from 1865. Student at Lincoln’s Inn, 1880; called to the bar, 1883.
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/1615/31/31)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 16 November 2017)
Norfolk, England, bishop’s transcripts, 1579–1935 (Ancestry.com, accessed 16 November 2017)
